requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications or related field

Excellent verbal and written communication skills
job-description: Sunrise Marketing Agency is seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Marketing Coordinator to join our team. requirements: Master's or PhD in Data Science, Computer Science, or related field

In this role, you will work with our team to analyze large data sets and develop predictive models. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in statistics and machine learning, as well as experience working with big data technologies such as Hadoop and Spark. If you are interested in this opportunity, please submit your resume and cover letter to recruiting@acmeanalytics.com.
